actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to redefine the term "single visit" for purposes of admission into designated units of the National Park System.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to redefine the term "single visit" for purposes of establishing admission fees to designated units of the National Park System. States that payment of a "single visit" admission fee shall authorize exits from and reentries to a single designated area for a period of from one to 15 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to redefine the term "single visit" for purposes of admission into designated units of the National Park System.
